author: Daniele Rossi
subject: download opening sequence to Italian series
body:
You probably know about this but just in case...

There's an Italian anime site with videos for download.  The opening
sequence to the Italian series of Lupin III is there too.  Go to
http://www.regnodelleanime.supereva.it/?p then on the left click on 'Lettere
L' and scroll down until you see Lupin.  Click on 'Download Video' and then
'JohnEfrem1' for the server location.
